vlive.korean: 술 마실 때 벨 눌러 주시고요. If you want to order, please press the button. 듣기 View video Park Si Hwan : 자기전~ Good night~..~

vlive.korean: [이젠 핸드벨로 연주할 때도 됐는데] 여긴 안 한다고? [They should be playing the hand bells now] We don't do this part? 듣기 View video BTS : Run BTS! 2019 - EP.63
vlive.english: [They should be playing the hand bells now] We don't do this part?

vlive.korean: 전화벨은 몇 번 울릴 때 받는 것이 예의일까요? How many times should you let the phone ring before answering it? 듣기 View video 우주소녀(WJSN) : 우주소녀 이미지 증발 버라이어티 <우소보쇼> 4화
vlive.english: How many times should you let the phone ring before answering it?

vlive.korean: 그리고 하다가 베었어요. 요리할 때 조심하세요. And I also cut my finger in the process. Be careful when you cook. 듣기 View video MONSTA X : 켠셰프의 쿸쿸 #3 [9월계획 몬베베미션]
vlive.english: And I also cut my finger in the process. Be careful when you cook.

vlive.korean: 이게 벨 소리에요 아니면 전화 걸었을 때 나는 소리에요? Is this the sound of the ringtone or the sound when you make the call? 듣기 View video MAMAMOO : Wind flower가 피었습니다💐
vlive.english: Is this the sound of the ringtone or the sound when you make the call?
